metadata.title: Crafting Mania LLC. 15 Princess and The Monster Silver Bottle Cap Pendant Necklaces Set 1
description: The Pendant is handmade by us with high quality Photo Paper, crystal clear Epoxy Sticker Dome and Shiny Silver Plated Bottle Cap and they all measure about 1" around. The Pendant is water resistant but not Water Proof. Pendant will come with 22" necklace in length. We try very hard to ensure your pendant is as beautiful as possible. Any problems, please email us so we can fix it. We do custom Pendants also so please don't hesitate to ask :)
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.1 x 3.5 x 0.7 inches; 12.63 Ounces", "Date First Available": "December 28, 2016", "Manufacturer": "Crafting Mania LLC.", "Country of Origin": "USA"}
